title: "Empower your application users to quickly explore their data with the new Power BI Embedding capabilities"
excerpt: "We’re excited to announce a new form of Power BI embedded analytics that enables you to embed an interactive data exploration and report creation experience in your applications. With this solution, you’ll be able to provide your users a similar experience to our integrations in Dynamics 365 and SharePoint."
